section_1_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you develop a comprehensive marketing strategy for a new product launch?","what_to_listen_for":["Clear understanding of market research and competitive analysis","Ability to define target audiences and value propositions","Experience with multi-channel marketing campaign planning","Knowledge of KPIs and success metrics"]},{"question":"Describe a time when you had to pivot your marketing strategy mid-campaign. What was the outcome?","what_to_listen_for":["Data-driven decision making and analytics interpretation","Flexibility and adaptability in changing market conditions","Strong communication with stakeholders during changes","Measurable results and lessons learned from the pivot"]},{"question":"What metrics do you prioritize when measuring marketing campaign success?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of both leading and lagging indicators","Knowledge of CAC LTV ROAS and other key marketing metrics","Ability to align metrics with business objectives","Experience with attribution modeling and ROI analysis"]}]
section_2_questions_json: [{"question":"What is your approach to optimizing digital marketing channels (SEO SEM social media email)?","what_to_listen_for":["Comprehensive knowledge across multiple digital channels","Experience with A/B testing and conversion rate optimization","Understanding of customer journey and touchpoint optimization","Familiarity with marketing automation and CRM tools"]},{"question":"How do you stay current with digital marketing trends and algorithm changes?","what_to_listen_for":["Commitment to continuous learning and professional development","Specific resources blogs certifications they follow","Examples of how they've adapted to recent changes (e.g. iOS privacy updates)","Proactive approach to testing new platforms and features"]},{"question":"Walk me through your process for creating and managing a marketing budget across multiple channels.","what_to_listen_for":["Experience with budget allocation and resource management","Data-driven approach to channel investment decisions","Understanding of seasonality and campaign timing","Ability to forecast and track spending vs performance"]}]
section_3_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you build and develop a high-performing marketing team?","what_to_listen_for":["Experience recruiting and developing marketing talent","Clear approach to setting goals and managing performance","Focus on team culture and collaboration","Examples of successful team outcomes and growth"]},{"question":"Describe your experience working with cross-functional teams (sales product design).","what_to_listen_for":["Strong communication and stakeholder management skills","Ability to bridge different perspectives and priorities","Experience with go-to-market alignment and collaboration","Specific examples of successful cross-functional projects"]},{"question":"How do you handle conflicts or disagreements about marketing direction?","what_to_listen_for":["Professional conflict resolution approach","Ability to use data to support recommendations","Willingness to listen and incorporate feedback","Focus on business outcomes over personal preferences"]}]

section_1_questions_json: [{"question":"Explain the difference between compilation and interpretation. When would you choose one over the other?","what_to_listen_for":["Clear understanding of language execution models","Knowledge of trade-offs between performance and flexibility","Awareness of JIT compilation and hybrid approaches","Ability to relate concepts to real-world use cases"]},{"question":"How would you design a system to handle 1 million concurrent users?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of distributed systems and scalability","Knowledge of load balancing caching and database optimization","Consideration of fault tolerance and reliability","Awareness of monitoring and observability requirements"]},{"question":"Walk me through your approach to debugging a production issue that you've never encountered before.","what_to_listen_for":["Systematic problem-solving methodology","Knowledge of debugging tools and logging practices","Ability to work under pressure and communicate effectively","Understanding of root cause analysis and prevention"]}]
section_2_questions_json: [{"question":"What does clean code mean to you? How do you ensure code quality in your projects?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of SOLID principles and design patterns","Experience with code reviews and testing practices","Knowledge of refactoring techniques","Commitment to maintainability and readability"]},{"question":"Describe a time when you had to refactor a complex piece of legacy code. What was your approach?","what_to_listen_for":["Patience and methodical approach to technical debt","Use of tests to ensure functionality preservation","Clear communication about risks and benefits","Specific examples of improvements achieved"]},{"question":"How do you approach designing APIs that other teams will consume?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of RESTful principles and API design best practices","Consideration of versioning backward compatibility and documentation","Focus on developer experience and ease of use","Knowledge of authentication authorization and rate limiting"]}]
section_3_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you stay current with new technologies and programming paradigms?","what_to_listen_for":["Genuine passion for technology and continuous learning","Specific resources communities or projects they engage with","Balance between depth in core skills and breadth in new areas","Examples of how learning translated to work improvements"]},{"question":"Describe your experience with code reviews. How do you give and receive feedback?","what_to_listen_for":["Constructive and respectful communication style","Focus on learning opportunities for both reviewer and author","Understanding that code reviews improve team knowledge","Examples of how feedback improved code quality"]},{"question":"Tell me about a technical decision you made that you later regretted. What did you learn?","what_to_listen_for":["Humility and willingness to acknowledge mistakes","Ability to learn from failures and apply lessons","Understanding of trade-offs in technical decisions","Growth mindset and continuous improvement focus"]}]

section_1_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you prioritize care when managing multiple patients with competing needs?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of triage principles and clinical priority assessment","Ability to recognize signs of deterioration and escalate appropriately","Time management and organizational skills","Patient safety focus and clinical judgment"]},{"question":"Describe your approach to medication administration and error prevention.","what_to_listen_for":["Knowledge of the five rights of medication administration","Understanding of double-check procedures and safety protocols","Awareness of high-alert medications and special precautions","Experience with medication reconciliation and patient education"]},{"question":"Walk me through your process for conducting a comprehensive patient assessment.","what_to_listen_for":["Systematic head-to-toe or body systems approach","Integration of subjective and objective data","Understanding of normal vs abnormal findings","Documentation practices and communication with care team"]}]
section_2_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you handle difficult conversations with patients or family members about care plans?","what_to_listen_for":["Empathy compassion and active listening skills","Ability to explain complex medical information in understandable terms","Respect for patient autonomy and cultural considerations","Collaboration with interdisciplinary team for support"]},{"question":"Describe a time when you advocated for a patient. What was the outcome?","what_to_listen_for":["Strong patient advocacy mindset","Professional assertiveness and communication","Understanding of ethical principles in healthcare","Positive impact on patient outcomes or experience"]},{"question":"How do you build rapport with patients who are anxious fearful or uncooperative?","what_to_listen_for":["Therapeutic communication techniques","Understanding of anxiety and fear responses","Patience and non-judgmental approach","Strategies for de-escalation and trust-building"]}]
section_3_questions_json: [{"question":"Tell me about a time when you recognized early warning signs of patient deterioration.","what_to_listen_for":["Clinical judgment and pattern recognition","Knowledge of early warning scoring systems","Appropriate escalation and team notification","Specific interventions initiated and outcomes"]},{"question":"How would you respond to a patient experiencing chest pain?","what_to_listen_for":["Immediate assessment of airway breathing circulation","Knowledge of cardiac emergency protocols (MONA ACS pathway)","Appropriate monitoring and diagnostic interventions","Communication with physician and emergency team"]},{"question":"Describe your experience with code blue or emergency situations.","what_to_listen_for":["Calm under pressure and clear thinking","Understanding of roles in code team","Experience with BLS/ACLS protocols","Reflection on teamwork and continuous improvement"]}]

section_1_questions_json: [{"question":"Walk me through how you would build a three-statement financial model.","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of income statement balance sheet and cash flow linkages","Knowledge of key financial metrics and ratios","Attention to detail and logical flow in model construction","Ability to explain assumptions and sensitivities"]},{"question":"How do you approach variance analysis when actual results differ from budget?","what_to_listen_for":["Systematic approach to identifying root causes","Understanding of volume price and mix effects","Ability to communicate findings to non-financial stakeholders","Recommendations for corrective actions or forecast adjustments"]},{"question":"Describe your experience with financial forecasting. What methods do you use?","what_to_listen_for":["Knowledge of time series analysis and regression techniques","Understanding of business drivers and their impact on financials","Experience with rolling forecasts vs annual budgets","Track record of forecast accuracy and continuous improvement"]}]
section_2_questions_json: [{"question":"What Excel functions and tools do you use most frequently in your analysis?","what_to_listen_for":["Proficiency with VLOOKUP INDEX MATCH SUMIFS pivot tables","Experience with Power Query and data transformation","Understanding of financial functions (NPV IRR XIRR)","Awareness of best practices for model design and error checking"]},{"question":"Have you worked with any financial software or ERP systems? Which ones?","what_to_listen_for":["Experience with SAP Oracle NetSuite or similar systems","Understanding of financial data architecture and reporting","Ability to extract and analyze data from multiple sources","Experience with business intelligence tools (Tableau Power BI)"]},{"question":"How do you ensure data accuracy and integrity in your financial reports?","what_to_listen_for":["Robust validation and reconciliation processes","Understanding of data governance and controls","Use of automated checks and audit trails","Documentation of data sources and assumptions"]}]
section_3_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you translate financial data into actionable business insights?","what_to_listen_for":["Ability to see beyond the numbers to business implications","Strong communication skills for presenting to executives","Understanding of industry trends and competitive dynamics","Examples of analysis that drove business decisions"]},{"question":"Describe a time when your financial analysis identified a significant opportunity or risk.","what_to_listen_for":["Proactive analytical approach and business curiosity","Clear communication of findings and recommendations","Impact of the analysis on business outcomes","Collaboration with business partners on solutions"]},{"question":"How do you prioritize projects when multiple stakeholders need analysis?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of business priorities and impact","Effective communication and expectation management","Time management and ability to handle multiple deadlines","Willingness to clarify requirements and push back when needed"]}]

section_1_questions_json: [{"question":"Walk me through your end-to-end design process from research to final delivery.","what_to_listen_for":["Structured approach incorporating user research and discovery","Understanding of design thinking and human-centered design","Integration of feedback loops and iteration","Collaboration with cross-functional teams throughout"]},{"question":"How do you approach designing for accessibility and inclusive design?","what_to_listen_for":["Knowledge of WCAG guidelines and accessibility standards","Understanding of diverse user needs and assistive technologies","Experience with accessibility testing and validation","Commitment to designing for all users not just average users"]},{"question":"Describe a time when user research completely changed your initial design concept.","what_to_listen_for":["Humility and willingness to challenge assumptions","Rigorous user research methodology","Ability to pivot based on evidence","Specific examples of insights that drove the change"]}]
section_2_questions_json: [{"question":"What is your process for creating and maintaining a design system?","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of atomic design principles and component libraries","Knowledge of design tokens and style guides","Experience with tools like Figma Sketch or Adobe XD","Collaboration with developers on implementation"]},{"question":"How do you balance user needs business goals and technical constraints?","what_to_listen_for":["Strategic thinking and ability to navigate trade-offs","Understanding of business metrics and product strategy","Technical awareness and collaboration with engineering","Advocacy for users while being pragmatic"]},{"question":"Walk me through how you design for mobile-first or responsive experiences.","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of responsive design principles","Knowledge of breakpoints and adaptive layouts","Consideration of touch targets and mobile interactions","Testing approach for different devices and contexts"]}]
section_3_questions_json: [{"question":"How do you present and defend your design decisions to stakeholders?","what_to_listen_for":["Clear articulation of design rationale tied to user needs","Use of data and research to support recommendations","Professional communication and stakeholder management","Openness to feedback while maintaining design integrity"]},{"question":"Describe your experience working with product managers and engineers.","what_to_listen_for":["Understanding of product development lifecycle","Collaborative mindset and ability to speak technical language","Examples of successful cross-functional projects","Ability to navigate competing priorities and constraints"]},{"question":"Tell me about a time when you received critical feedback on your design. How did you handle it?","what_to_listen_for":["Professional maturity and emotional intelligence","Ability to separate ego from work","Growth mindset and learning from feedback","Specific changes made and outcomes achieved"]}]
